actions.recommendation: PCOS - Glucophage was recently reinitiated; its important to increase exercise, eat better and to repeat your insulin levels in 6/12. Can also supplement with Pcositol
Screening mammogram and PAPsmear due - these screening tests are important to detect cancer
You are not happy with your sleep. Increase exercise, eat better, practice more mindfulness. Sleepio.com is a good resource to use
Your cholesterol is raised. Supplement with Omega 3, increase the intensity and frequency of exercise and eat a mediterannean style diet. Repeat levels in 3/12
Vit D is suboptimal - supplement with Vit D 5000 dly and repeat levels in 3/12
